keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

unmap i
unmap v
unmap V
unmap h
unmap l
map / removeTab
map \ copyCurrentUrl
map ' goUp
map [ goPrevious
map ] goNext
map <m-right> nextTab
map <m-left> previousTab
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight
map <a-w> removeTab
map l LinkHints.activateMode
map L LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <a-l> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
